title: The Lotus Keeper
description: Samuel Toney is a rising star at the corporate law firm where he was just hired. But when he discovers that the firm’s biggest threat is Marvin Clayton, a human rights leader dedicated to ending child sex trafficking, Sam begins to wonder what his new employers are hiding.After his boss grows suspicious of his loyalty during a trip overseas, Sam finds himself running for his life through Bangkok’s red light district. With his once-promising future lost, Sam joins up with Marvin Clayton and his team to crush his former employer and the sex-trafficking ring they support.
author: K.R. Dial
